statements: SELECT * FROM FinancialRatios
SELECT ratio_name, data_source FROM FinancialRatios
SELECT DISTINCT ratio_name FROM FinancialRatios
SELECT * FROM FinancialRatios WHERE calculation_method='Liquidity Ratio'
SELECT ratio_name, ratio_formula FROM FinancialRatios ORDER BY ratio_name ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM FinancialRatios ORDER BY ratio_name DESC;
SELECT ratio_name, ratio_formula FROM FinancialRatios WHERE data_source = 'Financial Statements' ORDER BY ratio_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM FinancialRatios WHERE calculation_method LIKE '%percentage%' ORDER BY ratio_name ASC;
SELECT ratio_name, calculation_method FROM FinancialRatios WHERE data_source = 'Industry Reports' ORDER BY ratio_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM FinancialRatios WHERE ratio_formula LIKE '%(Net Income%' ORDER BY ratio_name ASC;

SELECT id, ratio_name FROM financial_ratios ORDER BY ratio_name DESC
SELECT id, indicator_name FROM performance_indicators WHERE value < 50
SELECT * FROM financial_ratios WHERE ratio_name LIKE 'ROA%'
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM performance_indicators
SELECT * FROM financial_ratios WHERE value > 100
SELECT id, value, ratio_name FROM financial_ratios ORDER BY value DESC
SELECT ratio_name, AVG(value) as average_value FROM financial_ratios GROUP BY ratio_name
SELECT * FROM performance_indicators WHERE indicator_name LIKE 'Profit%'
SELECT COUNT(*) as num_indicators FROM performance_indicators
SELECT * FROM FinancialRatios;
SELECT ratio_name, description FROM FinancialRatios;

SELECT extraction_name, last_extraction_date FROM DataExtractions WHERE last_extraction_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM FinancialRatios WHERE ratio_name = 'Liquidity Ratio' OR description LIKE '%efficiency%';
SELECT id, name, ratio_type FROM financial_ratios;
SELECT * FROM performance_indicators WHERE baseline_value > 100;
SELECT company_id, revenue, net_income FROM financial_data WHERE expenses < 5000;
SELECT company_name, industry FROM company_info WHERE founded_date > '2000-01-01';
SELECT id, name, formula, description FROM financial_ratios ORDER BY name DESC;

SELECT name, ratio_type, formula FROM financial_ratios WHERE ratio_type = 'Liquidity';
SELECT company_name, industry, location FROM company_info WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT date, revenue, expenses, net_income FROM financial_data WHERE company_id = 1001;

SELECT id, current_assets, current_liabilities FROM FinancialRatios WHERE current_assets > current_liabilities;

SELECT * FROM LiquidityAnalysis WHERE quick_ratio < 1;
SELECT company_name, gross_margin, operating_margin FROM ProfitabilityMetrics WHERE operating_margin > 0.1;

SELECT company_name, gross_margin, operating_margin FROM ProfitabilityMetrics WHERE gross_margin > 0.2 AND operating_margin > 0.1;
SELECT company_name, revenue, net_income FROM PerformanceIndicators WHERE revenue > 1000000 ORDER BY net_income DESC;
